mapper.select: SELECT RENT_SEQ, RENT_DATE, RENT_RETURN_DATE, RENT_BCODE, RENT_UCODE, RENT_RETUR_YN, RENT_POINT FROM tbl_rent_book
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_rent_book ( RENT_SEQ, RENT_DATE, RENT_RETURN_DATE, RENT_BCODE, RENT_UCODE, RENT_RETUR_YN, RENT_POINT ) VALUES( SEQ_RENT.NEXTVAL, #{rent_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rent_return_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rent_bcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rent_ucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rent_retur_yn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rent_point,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
